properties.name: endpoints.zookeeper.enabled
properties.description: Enable the /zookeeper endpoint to inspect the state of zookeeper.

properties.name: management.health.zookeeper.enabled
properties.description: Enable the health endpoint for zookeeper.

properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.base-sleep-time-ms
properties.description: Initial amount of time to wait between retries

properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.block-until-connected-unit
properties.description: The unit of time related to blocking on connection to Zookeeper

properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.block-until-connected-wait
properties.description: Wait time to block on connection to Zookeeper

properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.connect-string
properties.description: Connection string to the Zookeeper cluster

properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.max-retries
properties.description: Max number of times to retry

properties.name: spring.cloud.zookeeper.max-sleep-ms
properties.description: Max time in ms to sleep on each retry
